TunableTuple.name: OBJECT_SQ_DISTANCE_THRESHOLD
TunableTuple.description: The distance threshold between the user's click on water and objects in the world that have WATER_TERRAIN_TAGS. If the user picks water, we find the nearest object in this distance threshold and generate a pie menu.

TunableEnum.name: comparison
TunableEnum.description: The comparison to perform against the value.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The value of the threshold that the collection is compared against.

TunableList.name: WATER_TERRAIN_TAGS
TunableList.description: The Tags on Object Definitions that mark objects for caching near the water. Please make exclusive tags for this, as we don't want to include objects that don't make sense.

TunableEnum.description: A tag that marks an object for caching near the water terrain.
